title: Wonderful
review:
Pros:

Very Slim Mobile and Light weight(179gm).
Finger Print Option.
Total 3 slots are available. 2 for SIM Cards(Dual SIM) and 1 for Memory card.
Fast charging
Battery life is very Good, almost 1.5day.
Supporting Jio 4G VoLTE.
Camera quality is good and front camera is also having flash.
4GB RAM and usable 20GB/32GB Internal memory.

Cons:

USB cable lenth is very small.
Front side notification light is not available but backside smart glow is available.
Audio quality is not upto mark in this range.

title: Great product
review: Very fast service by Flipkart. Good. Keep it up.

title: Worth every penny
review:
I am going to start with the delivery experience, got the item delivered within 18 hours with standard delivery option. Kudos to Flipkart for that.

I have been using the phone for about two weeks, writing my review on basis of that:

Pros:
1. Awesome rear camera, even during dim lights.
2. Superfast performance, till now have not experienced even slightest lagging. Keeping fingers crossed.
3. Loaded with lots of customization features, this makes the phone really handy to use.
4. No issues with storage memory, sound clarity and display.

Cons:
1. Do not have gorilla glass. Had to spend a lot on buying an external tempered glass.
2. Front camera is not so good during low lights. But the front flash comes to the rescue for that.
3. Does not support NFC.

Overall I am satisfied with the phone. I am giving it a 5 on 5.

title: Worth the money
review:
I have been using this mobile since a month and below are my observations:

1. Excellent Battery Backup, Even with 12 hrs of wifi & bluetooth headset continously connected, i have noticed atleast 20 hours of good battery performance.
2. Charging time is atleast 1.15 minutes
3. RAM performance is good and uses 45% atleast.
4. Auto focus not available
5. Good display brightness, perfect of big screen lovers.

Overall a good medium budget mobile from Samsung and am happy using this.
